name: Cleanin' N Runnin'
description:
cleanning...
cleanning never changes...
or does it?

the cleanning has changed...
did it?
the answer is "no"!
unless it is "yes"...
No! of course it is, it is cleanning!
Yes!
No...
Yes?...
